The meeting minutes from our last meeting on May 5, 2024, are attached to this email. As a summary, we discussed the client's requirements for the new project, agreed on the project timeline and key milestones, and reviewed the initial design concepts. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns. 

Best regards, 
Emma Johnson
